entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Drifting snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023
